DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy ABT-493 ABT-530 ( ABT-493/ABT-530 ) coadministered without ribavirin adult chronic HCV genotypes 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 6 infection . In part 4 , primary objective also include assess efficacy ( SVR12 ) treatment ABT-493/ABT-530 combination regimen GT2-infected DAA-naive subject without cirrhosis compare historical SVR12 rate treatment sofosbuvir plus RBV GT2-infected DAA-naive subject without cirrhosis .
